overview_of_class: Study of the tradition of testimonial writing in Latin America with attention to cultural, political, and historical contexts and questions of truth, memory, and subjectivity. Works by authors such as Miguel Barnet, Gabriel García Márquez, Rigoberta Menchú, Alicia Partnoy, Elena Poniatowska, Jacobo Timerman, and Rodolfo Walsh.
name: Testimonial Narrative in Latin America
title: WCAS SPANISH 346-0-1 Testimonial Narrative in Latin America
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration - Reserved for Spanish Studies students.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Study of the tradition of testimonial writing in Latin America with attention to cultural, political, and historical contexts and questions of truth, memory, and subjectivity. subject: SPANISH
